## Project

**plasma-ai-usage-monitor** — KDE Plasma 6 panel widget to monitor AI API token usage, rate limits, and costs

Tech stack: QML/C++ + KDE Plasma 6

## Commands

- Build: `cmake -B build && cmake --build build`
- Test: `cmake --build build --target test`

## Code Style

- C++20 standard, Qt6/KF6 APIs
- QML: follow KDE HIG guidelines
- Formatter: clang-format
- Linter: clang-tidy
- CMake: use modern target-based API

## Testing

- Framework: Qt Test / CTest
- Tests alongside source in `tests/` directory
